trans-unit.source: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data.
trans-unit.target: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data.

trans-unit.source: Enrich your dashboard: display a graphical representation of your store’s development.
trans-unit.target: Enrich your dashboard: display a graphical representation of your store’s development.

trans-unit.source: Sum of revenue (excl. tax) generated within the date range by orders considered validated.
trans-unit.target: Sum of revenue (excl. tax) generated within the date range by orders considered validated.

trans-unit.source: Total number of orders received within the date range that are considered validated.
trans-unit.target: Total number of orders received within the date range that are considered validated.

trans-unit.source: Average Cart Value is a metric representing the value of an average order within the date range. It is calculated by dividing Sales by Orders.
trans-unit.target: Average Cart Value is a metric representing the value of an average order within the date range. It is calculated by dividing Sales by Orders.

trans-unit.source: Total number of visits within the date range. A visit is the period of time a user is actively engaged with your website.
trans-unit.target: Total number of visits within the date range. A visit is the period of time a user is actively engaged with your website.

trans-unit.source: Ecommerce Conversion Rate is the percentage of visits that resulted in an validated order.
trans-unit.target: Ecommerce Conversion Rate is the percentage of visits that resulted in an validated order.

trans-unit.source: Net profit is a measure of the profitability of a venture after accounting for all Ecommerce costs. You can provide these costs by clicking on the configuration icon right above here.
trans-unit.target: Net profit is a measure of the profitability of a venture after accounting for all Ecommerce costs. You can provide these costs by clicking on the configuration icon right above here.
